entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
